CONSOLE WARNING: line 3078: Element.createShadowRoot is deprecated and will be removed in M73, around March 2019. Please use Element.attachShadow instead. See https://www.chromestatus.com/features/4507242028072960 for more details.
Tests to ensure network waterfall column updates header height when headers are not visible.

Setting initial large row setting to false
Fetching resource
Node rendered showing fetch resource
Height of waterfall header: 0
Setting large row setting to true
Unselecting request from grid
Height of waterfall header: 31
